sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Flex, Box, Text, useBreakpoint } from 'quantum-elements' import Container from './container' import NavLink from './navlink' function Navbar() { const [showMobileNav, setShowMobileNav] = useState(false) const isMobile = useBreakpoint() === 0 return ( Michael Auderer {isMobile ? ( setShowMobileNav(!showMobileNav)} /> ) : ( Blog Portfolio About Contact )} ) } export default React.memo(Navbar)
